meta.name: Vibe Coding Dark
meta.description: 深色终端风格主题，适合夜间阅读

base.container: background-color: #0d1117; color: #c9d1d9; font-family: Consolas, Monaco, 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 15px; line-height: 1.75; padding: 10px; letter-spacing: 0.5px; text-align: left;

header_window.style: background-color: #161b22; border: 1px solid #30363d; border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0; padding: 10px 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #30363d; display: flex; align-items: center; margin-bottom: 20px;
dots: width:12px; height:12px; background:#ff5f56; border-radius:50%; margin-right:8px; border:1px solid #e0443e;
width:12px; height:12px; background:#ffbd2e; border-radius:50%; margin-right:8px; border:1px solid #dea123;
width:12px; height:12px; background:#27c93f; border-radius:50%; margin-right:15px; border:1px solid #1aab29;

headings.h2: background-color: #161b22; border-left: 5px solid #58a6ff; padding: 10px 15px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; color: #c9d1d9;
headings.h3: font-size: 16px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 10px; color: #58a6ff; margin-top: 30px;
headings.h1: background-color: #161b22; border-left: 5px solid #58a6ff; padding: 10px 15px; margin-bottom: 20px; font-size: 17px; font-weight: bold; color: #c9d1d9;
headings.h4: font-size: 15px; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 8px; color: #57606a; margin-top: 20px;

text.code_inline: background-color: #161b22; padding: 2px 4px; border-radius: 4px; color: #ff7b72; font-family: monospace; font-size: 90%;

blocks.code_block: background-color: #161b22; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; border: 1px solid #30363d; color: #c9d1d9; margin-bottom: 15px; overflow-x: auto; font-size: 13px;
blocks.quote_tip: background-color: #1c2b1c; border: 1px solid #238636; color: #3fb950; padding: 12px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.quote_warning: background-color: #2c1b1b; border: 1px solid #f85149; color: #ff7b72; padding: 12px; border-radius: 6px; font-size: 14px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.quote_note: background-color: #e8f4fd; border-left: 4px solid #0969da; color: #0c3d6a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_info: background-color: #def7ff; border-left: 4px solid #58a6ff; color: #0c447a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.quote_default: background-color: #f6f8fa; border-left: 4px solid #57606a; color: #57606a; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px; border-radius: 0 6px 6px 0;
blocks.details: background-color: #f6f8fa; border: 1px solid #d0d7de; border-radius: 6px; padding: 12px; margin-bottom: 15px;
blocks.summary: font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; color: #0969da; margin-bottom: 8px;

media.image_placeholder: background-color: #161b22; border: 1px dashed #30363d; color: #8b949e; padding: 20px; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 15px; font-size: 13px;
media.image: max-width: 100%; height: auto; display: block; margin: 15px 0; border-radius: 4px;

math.inline: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 2px 6px; border-radius: 4px; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-style: italic;
math.block: background-color: #f6f8fa; padding: 15px; border-radius: 6px; text-align: center; margin: 15px 0; overflow-x: auto; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif;
